testcase.name: Buy a property from NoBroker Website
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage of NoBroker website...........................passed When user selects the buy option............................................passed And user selects the city name from the dropdown list.......................passed And user types the localities...............................................passed And User select a Full House radio button...................................passed And user User selects BHK type from the dropdown list.......................passed And User selects the property status from the dropdown list.................passed And User clicks on checkbox for additional features.........................passed And User clicks on the search button........................................passed Then User should see a list of properties matching the search criteria......passed

testcase.name: Posting Comments on Packers and Movers Service - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage of NoBroker website...........................passed When User click on the Menu tab.............................................passed And User click on Blog option...............................................passed And User click on P & M option..............................................passed And User select one of the project..........................................passed And user click on Comment option............................................passed And User post comment with Highly recommend the vehicle shifting service in Delhi. Smooth process and customer service, made my experience hassle-free.,Pranjaliii,pranjall767@gmail.com,Packers and Movers.passed And User click on post comment..............................................passed Then User should receive a confirmation message.............................passed

testcase.name: Transfer Home Loan
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage of NoBroker website...........................passed When User is on home loan page..............................................passed When User enter details with Name, Mobile Number, Outstanding Principal Amount and Current Interest Rate.passed And User select Primary Bank Account........................................passed And User click on submit button.............................................passed Then User should see Congratulation! message................................passed

testcase.name: Contacting NRI Parents Care Centre - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage of NoBroker website...........................passed When User click on Menu tab.................................................passed And User click on the Blog option...........................................passed And User click on the NRI option............................................passed And User selects one of the project.........................................passed And User enter their Samruddhi..............................................passed And User select City and Service............................................passed And User enters "9234567890" and sam76@gmail.com............................passed And User click on Submit....................................................passed Then User should receive a confirmation message that Thanks for your Response.passed
